00086 // doxygen documentation program. doxygen is forced to include the

00088 // that then can be linked directly.
00089 // This "dirty trick" is necessary, because to put "\example [filename]"
00090 // directly into method documentations has some unaesthetic side effects.

00520 template < class T >
00521 Array< T > transpose( const Array< T >& v )
00522 {
00523     SIZE_CHECK( v.ndim( ) == 2 )
00524     Array< T > z;
00525     z.resize( v.dim( 1 ), v.dim( 0 ) );
00526     for( unsigned i = v.dim( 0 ); i--; )
00527         for( unsigned j = v.dim( 1 ); j--; )
00528             z( j, i ) = v( i, j );
00529     return Array< T >( z, true );
00530 }
00531 
00532 
00533 //===========================================================================
00585 template < class T >
00586 Array< T > diagonal( const Array< T >& v )
00587 {
00588     SIZE_CHECK( v.ndim( ) == 1 )
00589     Array< T > z( v.nelem( ), v.nelem( ) );
00590     z = 0;
00591     for( unsigned i = v.nelem( ); i--; )
00592         z( i, i ) = v.elem( i );
00593     return Array< T >( z, true );
00594 }
00595

00597 //===========================================================================
00637 template < class T >
00638 T trace( const Array< T >& v )
00639 {
00640     SIZE_CHECK( v.ndim( ) == 2 && v.dim( 0 ) == v.dim( 1 ) )
00641 
00642     T t( v( 0, 0 ) );
00643     for( unsigned i = 1; i < v.dim( 0 ); ++i )
00644         t += v( i, i );
00645     return t;
00646 }
